sentences.sContent: A crowd gathered to watch the fight.
sentences.sCn: 一群人聚拢来围观打架。

sentences.sContent: Thousands of people gathered outside the embassy.
sentences.sCn: 大使馆外面聚集了数千人。

sentences.sContent: During the air raids, we gathered the children around us and sang songs.
sentences.sCn: 空袭期间，我们把孩子们聚集在身边唱歌。

synos.tran: 收集；收割；使…聚集；使…皱起

trans.tranCn: 聚集， 集合， 聚拢； 收集， 采集； 逐渐增加； 猜想， 推测
trans.tranOther: to come together and form a group, or to make people do this
